cause.description:
Change 4 Children is a Christian organization, originated, organized, and operated by kids for kids. We’ve been called by God to serve.
www.freewebs.com/kidscare4kids
1. Change 4 Children is also a fun way to hangout and meet new people.
2. It offers many opportunities for teens and kids like us to serve people in need worldwide.
3. We also love the opportunity to put a smile on the faces of children.
cause.mission: To serve children in need, bringing hope and smiles to them, while setting an example by encouraging people around us to do their part and striving to build a strong relationship with God.
cause.name: Change4Children
